thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: very good hotel and good location
thread.title_full: very good hotel and good location - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Julius R
title: very good hotel and good location
text:
The hotel is very nice, modern, clean and good breakfast.The staff is very friendly and we enjoyed our stay. The location is very good, quite street, good area, close to Termini station and also to main attraction with good connections.
Room Tip: ask for a room to the main street. See more room tips
